mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.user_id, a.cover, a.title, a.content, a.type, a.time_start, a.time_end, a.`status`, u.avatar, u.nickname FROM a_appointment a LEFT JOIN u_user u on u.id = a.user_id WHERE a.id = #{appointmentId}

SELECT a.id, a.cover, a.type, a.title, a.time_start, a.time_end, a.user_id, u.avatar, u.nickname FROM a_appointment a LEFT JOIN u_user u ON u.id = a.user_id
a.type = 1 and a.`status` = 1
and (a.title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or u.nickname like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC, a.time_start, a.time_end

select a.id, a.cover, a.title, a.content, a.time_start, a.time_end, a.user_id, a.create_time, a.update_time, u.avatar, u.nickname from (SELECT id, user_id, cover, title, content, time_start, time_end, create_time, update_time From a_appointment WHERE type = #{type} AND `status` = 1 AND id = #{appointmentId}) a LEFT JOIN u_user u ON a.user_id = u.id
SELECT id, cover as img, title FROM a_appointment WHERE type = 1 AND `status` = 1 AND id < #{appointmentId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, cover as img, title FROM a_appointment WHERE type = 1 AND `status` = 1 AND id > #{appointmentId} ORDER BY id LIMIT 1
SELECT id FROM a_appointment WHERE status != 5 AND sysdate() >= time_start;
